name: NotHawthorne
body:
###Biography  
**Name**: NotHawthorne
**Age**: 20  
**Location**: Coral Springs, FL 
  
###Projects  
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////  
**Project Name**: umbra  
**Status**: **Active!**
**Languages Employed**: C++  
**Libraries Utilized**: [Qt 5.4](https://github.com/qtproject/qt5), [Crypto++](https://github.com/mmoss/cryptopp)  
**Description**: A decentralized social networking solution.  
**Screenshot**: [Link](http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-esI48IF9F_c/VZREvCu7X2I/AAAAAAAAAC0/YvTRh2RVHrI/s1600/Screenshot%2Bfrom%2B2015-07-01%2B15%253A50%253A02.png)  
**Repo**: [Link](https://github.com/NotHawthorne/umbra)  
**DevBlog**: [Link](http://epistulaumbra.blogspot.com/)  
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////  
**Project Name**: Shard  
**Status**: Discontinued.
**Languages Employed**: Lua, C++  
**Libraries Utilized**: [AIO](http://rochet2.github.io/AIO.html)  
**Description**: An extreme modification of core World of Warcraft systems for use in private servers.  
**Screenshot**: [Link](http://i.imgur.com/87kS5Djm.jpg)  
**Repo**: [Link](https://github.com/NotHawthorne/Shard-Emulation)  
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////   
  
###Contact  
**E-mail**: nothawthorne@airmail.cc
